video_prompt: A lone figure, chest up, gazes intently, wind-swept hair swaying. Giant robot emerges in background, its mechanical parts shifting. Small, dark shapes drift across the bright sky, suggesting debris or distant movement. Figure's expression subtly shifts from serious to thoughtful.
image_prompt: A solo young man in a tactical uniform, wind-swept hair, serious expression, looking right, chest-up, in sharp focus. Behind him, a massive, out-of-focus Gundam-like robot with visible weaponry and intricate details, towering against a bright, possibly overcast sky. Black and white, shallow depth of field, with small blurred debris/dust in the background.
refined_video_prompt: A figure's wind-swept hair sways. In the background, a giant robot emerges, its mechanical parts shifting and articulating. Small, dark shapes drift across the sky. The figure's expression subtly transitions from serious to thoughtful.
